head.supplied: QUARTERLY ESTIMATE. ¶ To the Honorable ¶ ¶ the Chief Secretary ¶ Sir ¶ , ¶ ¶ I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate ¶ * ¶ of Expenditure during ¶ the ¶ Quarter ¶ ¶ ending ¶ ...

div.p: S80/1719 unit 1129, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

note.p: MS written by G. Luehmann and signed by M.

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate *
of Expenditure during
the
Quarter
ending 31 March 1 880.

6 8 written over –– in these two columns.
–

cell.p:
Paper for Lithograms
This row struck out, but not the added £18 15– in 'Amount of estimates previously approved' column.

cell.p:
50 struck out and 25 added above and also struck out , with 6 5 –added instead below.
50

cell.p:
Towards Flora Australiensis
Towards Flora Australiensis struck out,
but amounts remain. SeeM to G. Berry, 7 September 1878and notes thereto.
